import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Message, Header, Image, Icon, Button, Segment, Card } from "semantic-ui-react"; import simplyRoleplayImage from "../Images/simplyRoleplay.png"; import expressImage from "../Images/express Icon.png"; import firebaseImage from "../Images/firebase.svg"; class RoleplayWebsite extends Component { onClick = to => { window.open(to, "_blank").focus(); } render() { const learnedSkills = ["Infinite Scroll", "Semantic UI", "Mongodb"]; return (
Roleplay Website
Idea
 The large community of roleplayers have adopted Discord as their main roleplay system. This website is geared as a replacement for that system and provides a platform with features focused around roleplay. In this site, you can create characters with their own backstories and etc. You can then apply that character to many stories to start roleplaying as that character in them. Alternatively, you can create a story yourself that other people can apply their characters to start roleplaying.

Simply Roleplay is a full-stack website. It was build from the ground up using Express for routing, Mongo and Mongoose as a no-SQL database, Firebase for authentication
Knowledge Learned
 { learnedSkills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} )) } ); } } export default RoleplayWebsite;
